short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension creates a trello card whose title that of the current tab with a shortened url of the page in the description.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabs for Trello is a simple app that creates a new Trello card on a board and list that you select based on the active tab that you have open. The title of the card is set to the title of the tab and the description is set to the shortened url of the tab.
